info.name: Influencer Backend API
info.description: Full project API documentation with DTO checks and body responses.

request.description:
Register a new influencer.

DTO: SignupDto
- firstName: string (required)
- lastName: string (required)
- phone: string (required, valid BD phone number)
- email: string (valid email)
- password: string (min 8 chars)
- role: enum (influencer, etc.)

Verify OTP for phone number verification.

DTO: VerifyOtpDto
- phone: string (required)
- otp: string (required)

Resend OTP to phone number. Rate limited to 1 request per minute.

DTO: ResendOtpDto
- phone: string (required, valid BD phone number e.g. +8801XXXXXXXXX)

Login for influencers.

DTO: LoginDto
- email: string (valid email)
- password: string (required)

Request password reset OTP.

DTO: ForgotPasswordDto
- identifier: string (Email or Phone)

Reset password using OTP.

DTO: ResetPasswordDto
- identifier: string (Email or Phone)
- otp: string (required)
- newPassword: string (min 8 chars)

List all profiles for verification.

Query Params:
- page: number
- limit: number
Get details of one profile for verification.

Approve or reject a niche.

DTO: UpdateItemStatusDto
- identifier: string (Name of niche)
- status: enum (approved, rejected, pending, unverified)

Approve or reject a skill.

DTO: UpdateItemStatusDto
- identifier: string (Name of skill)
- status: enum (approved, rejected, pending, unverified)

Approve or reject a social link.

DTO: UpdateItemStatusDto
- identifier: string (URL)
- status: enum (approved, rejected, pending, unverified)

Approve or reject NID verification.

DTO: UpdateNidStatusDto
- nidStatus: enum (approved, rejected, pending, unverified)

Approve or reject bank payout method.

DTO: UpdatePayoutStatusDto
- accountNo: string
- status: enum (approved, rejected, pending, unverified)

Approve or reject mobile payout method.

DTO: UpdatePayoutStatusDto
- accountNo: string
- status: enum (approved, rejected, pending, unverified)

List all client profiles for verification.

Query Params:
- page: number
- limit: number

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

List client profiles pending NID verification.

Query Params:
- page: number
- limit: number

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

List client profiles pending Trade License verification.

Query Params:
- page: number
- limit: number

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Get details of one client profile for verification.

Path Params:
- userId: UUID

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Approve or reject client NID verification.

DTO: UpdateClientNidStatusDto
- nidStatus: enum (approved, rejected, pending, unverified)
- rejectionReason: string (optional)

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Approve or reject client Trade License verification.

DTO: UpdateClientTradeLicenseStatusDto
- tradeLicenseStatus: enum (approved, rejected, pending, unverified)
- rejectionReason: string (optional)

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Approve or reject a client's social link.

DTO: UpdateClientSocialStatusDto
- profileUrl: string (The URL of the social link)
- status: enum (approved, rejected, pending, unverified)

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role
Get current logged-in influencer profile.

Update onboarding details (Address, Socials, NID).

DTO: OnboardingDto

Add niches to profile.

DTO: AddNichesDto

Add skills to profile.

DTO: AddSkillsDto

Add payout methods.

DTO: AddPayoutDto

Add address.

DTO: AddLocationDto

Register a new client. OTP will be sent to phone.

DTO: CreateClientDto
- brandName: string (required)
- firstName: string (required)
- lastName: string (required)
- email: string (required, valid email)
- phone: string (required, valid BD phone number like +8801XXXXXXXXX)
- password: string (required)

Verify OTP sent to client's phone number. Returns JWT token on success.

DTO: VerifyClientOtpDto
- phone: string (required)
- otp: string (required)

Resend OTP to client's phone number.

DTO: ResendClientOtpDto
- phone: string (required)

Get current logged-in client's profile.

Requires: JWT Token

Update client address (only after phone verification).

DTO: UpdateClientAddressDto
- thana: string (optional)
- zila: string (optional)
- fullAddress: string (optional)

Requires: JWT Token + Phone Verified

Update website and social media links.

DTO: UpdateClientSocialDto
- website: string (optional, valid URL)
- socialLinks: array (optional)
  - platform: string (e.g., facebook, instagram, linkedin, twitter, youtube, tiktok)
  - profileUrl: string

Requires: JWT Token + Phone Verified

Update NID information.

DTO: UpdateClientNidDto
- nidNumber: string (optional)
- nidFrontImg: string (optional, S3 URL)
- nidBackImg: string (optional, S3 URL)

Requires: JWT Token + Phone Verified

Update trade license information.

DTO: UpdateClientTradeLicenseDto
- tradeLicenseNumber: string (optional)
- tradeLicenseImg: string (optional, S3 URL)

Requires: JWT Token + Phone Verified

Complete onboarding with all profile details at once.

DTO: ClientOnboardingDto
- thana: string (optional)
- zila: string (optional)
- fullAddress: string (optional)
- website: string (optional)
- socialLinks: array (optional)
  - platform: string
  - profileUrl: string
- nidNumber: string (optional)
- nidFrontImg: string (optional, S3 URL)
- nidBackImg: string (optional, S3 URL)
- tradeLicenseNumber: string (optional)
- tradeLicenseImg: string (optional, S3 URL)

Requires: JWT Token + Phone Verified

General profile update.

DTO: UpdateClientDto
- brandName: string (optional)
- firstName: string (optional)
- lastName: string (optional)
- thana: string (optional)
- zila: string (optional)
- fullAddress: string (optional)
- website: string (optional)
- socialLinks: array (optional)
- nidNumber: string (optional)
- nidFrontImg: string (optional)
- nidBackImg: string (optional)
- tradeLicenseNumber: string (optional)
- tradeLicenseImg: string (optional)

Requires: JWT Token

Get all clients with pagination (Admin only).

Query Params:
- page: number (default: 1)
- limit: number (default: 10)

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Get a single client by ID (Admin only).

Path Params:
- id: UUID (required)

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Delete a client by ID (Admin only).

Path Params:
- id: UUID (required)

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Create a new campaign (Step 1 - Basic Info).

DTO: CreateCampaignStep1Dto
- campaignName: string (required)
- campaignType: enum (required) - 'paid_ad' | 'influencer_promotion'

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

Update targeting and influencer preferences (Step 2).

DTO: UpdateCampaignStep2Dto
- productType: string (required)
- campaignNiche: string (required)
- preferredInfluencerIds: array of UUIDs (optional)
- notPreferableInfluencerIds: array of UUIDs (optional)

Note: Preferred and Not Preferable lists must NOT overlap.

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

body.raw:
{
    "campaignGoals": "Increase brand awareness and drive sales for summer collection",
    "productServiceDetails": "Summer fashion collection including dresses, tops, and accessories",
    "reportingRequirements": "Weekly performance reports with engagement metrics",
    "usageRights": "Brand can use content for 6 months on all platforms",
    "startingDate": "2025-01-15",
    "duration": 30
}

request.description:
Update campaign details (Step 3).

DTO: UpdateCampaignStep3Dto
- campaignGoals: string (required)
- productServiceDetails: string (required)
- reportingRequirements: string (optional)
- usageRights: string (optional)
- startingDate: Date (required, must be in future)
- duration: number (required, min 1 day)

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

body.raw:
{
    "baseBudget": 50000,
    "milestones": [
        {
            "contentTitle": "Product Unboxing Video",
            "platform": "youtube",
            "contentQuantity": "1 Sponsored Video",
            "deliveryDays": 7,
            "expectedReach": 100000,
            "expectedViews": 50000,
            "expectedLikes": 5000,
            "expectedComments": 500
        },
        {
            "contentTitle": "Instagram Reel",
            "platform": "instagram",
            "contentQuantity": "2 Reels",
            "deliveryDays": 14,
            "expectedReach": 200000,
            "expectedViews": 100000,
            "expectedLikes": 10000,
            "expectedComments": 1000
        },
        {
            "contentTitle": "TikTok Video",
            "platform": "tiktok",
            "contentQuantity": "3 Videos",
            "deliveryDays": 21,
            "expectedReach": 500000,
            "expectedViews": 300000,
            "expectedLikes": 25000,
            "expectedComments": 2000
        }
    ]
}

request.description:
Update budget and milestones (Step 4).

DTO: UpdateCampaignStep4Dto
- baseBudget: number (required, min 0)
- milestones: array (required, min 1 item)
  - contentTitle: string (required)
  - platform: enum (required) - 'facebook' | 'youtube' | 'tiktok' | 'instagram'
  - contentQuantity: string (required) - e.g., '1 Sponsored Video'
  - deliveryDays: number (required, min 1)
  - expectedReach: number (optional)
  - expectedViews: number (optional)
  - expectedLikes: number (optional)
  - expectedComments: number (optional)
  - order: number (optional)

Budget Calculation (15% VAT):
- VAT = baseBudget  0.15
- totalBudget = baseBudget + VAT
- netPayableAmount = totalBudget

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

Update content assets and final setup (Step 5).

DTO: UpdateCampaignStep5Dto
- assets: array (optional)
  - assetType: enum (required) - 'brand_logo' | 'product_demo_video' | 'brand_guidelines' | 'image' | 'video' | 'pdf' | 'other'
  - fileName: string (required)
  - fileUrl: string (required, S3 URL)
  - fileSize: number (optional, bytes)
  - mimeType: string (optional)
  - description: string (optional)
- needSampleProduct: boolean (required)

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

Place/Submit the campaign for quote. Campaign must have all required fields filled.

Validation Requirements:
- Step 1: campaignName, campaignType
- Step 2: productType, campaignNiche
- Step 3: campaignGoals, productServiceDetails, startingDate, duration (min 1)
- Step 4: baseBudget (> 0), at least 1 milestone

Once placed:
- Campaign becomes visible to admin for quoting
- Campaign is ready for negotiation

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

query.description: Optional: needs_quote | active | pending_invitation | completed | paid | cancelled

request.description:
Get all campaigns for the logged-in client.

Query Params (SearchCampaignDto):
- page: number (default: 1)
- limit: number (default: 10)
- status: enum (optional) - 'needs_quote' | 'active' | 'pending_invitation' | 'completed' | 'paid' | 'cancelled'
- campaignType: enum (optional) - 'paid_ad' | 'influencer_promotion'
- search: string (optional) - Search by campaign name

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

Get a single campaign by ID with all relations (milestones, assets, influencers).

Path Params:
- id: UUID (required)

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

Delete a campaign. Only campaigns in 'needs_quote' status can be deleted.

Path Params:
- id: UUID (required)

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role + Campaign must be in 'needs_quote' status

Delete a campaign asset. Cannot delete from active campaigns.

Path Params:
- assetId: UUID (required)

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role + Campaign must be in 'needs_quote' status

Preview budget calculation with 15% VAT.

Query Params:
- baseBudget: number (required)

Response:
- baseBudget: number
- vatAmount: number (15%)
- totalBudget: number
- netPayableAmount: number

Requires: JWT Token

Send a counter-offer with a different price.

DTO: CreateNegotiationDto
- campaignId: UUID (required)
- action: enum (required) - 'counter_offer' | 'message'
- proposedBaseBudget: number (optional)
- message: string (optional)

Note: Must be client's turn to respond.

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

Accept the quoted price. Campaign becomes active.

DTO: AcceptNegotiationDto
- campaignId: UUID (required)
- message: string (optional)

Effect:
- The quoted price is applied to the campaign
- Campaign status stays 'active'
- Quote is finalized

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

Cancel the campaign.

DTO: RejectCampaignDto
- campaignId: UUID (required)
- reason: string (required)

Effect:
- Campaign status changes to 'cancelled'

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

Get full negotiation history for a campaign.

Path Params:
- id: UUID (required) - Campaign ID

Response includes:
- Campaign basic info (id, name, status, negotiationTurn)
- All negotiation entries in chronological order

Requires: JWT Token + Client Role

Mark a negotiation entry as read.

Path Params:
- negotiationId: UUID (required)

Requires: JWT Token

query.description: Optional: needs_quote | active | pending_invitation | completed | paid | cancelled
Optional: Filter by start date range
Optional: Filter by start date range

request.description:
Get all campaigns with filters (Admin only).

Query Params (SearchCampaignDto):
- page: number (default: 1)
- limit: number (default: 10)
- status: enum (optional)
- campaignType: enum (optional)
- clientId: UUID (optional)
- startDateFrom: Date (optional)
- startDateTo: Date (optional)
- search: string (optional)

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Get a single campaign by ID with all relations (Admin view).

Path Params:
- id: UUID (required)

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Update campaign status (Admin only).

DTO: UpdateCampaignStatusDto
- status: enum (required) - 'needs_quote' | 'active' | 'pending_invitation' | 'completed' | 'paid' | 'cancelled'
- reason: string (optional)

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Send a price quote to client (Admin only).

DTO: CreateNegotiationDto
- campaignId: UUID (required)
- action: enum (required) - 'request' | 'counter_offer' | 'message'
- proposedBaseBudget: number (required for quote)
- message: string (optional)

Effect:
- Campaign status changes to 'active'
- Turn switches to 'client'

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Confirm and activate the campaign (Admin).

DTO: AcceptNegotiationDto
- campaignId: UUID (required)
- message: string (optional)

Effect:
- Campaign status changes to 'active'
- Quote is finalized

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Cancel the campaign (Admin).

DTO: RejectCampaignDto
- campaignId: UUID (required)
- reason: string (required)

Effect:
- Campaign status changes to 'cancelled'

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Get full negotiation history for a campaign (Admin view).

Path Params:
- id: UUID (required) - Campaign ID

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Assign an active campaign to one or multiple influencers.

DTO: AssignCampaignDto
- campaignId: UUID (required)
- assignments: array (required, min 1)
  - influencerId: UUID (required)
  - offeredAmount: number (required, min 0)
  - offerMessage: string (optional)
  - offerTerms: string (optional)
  - assignedMilestones: array (optional)
    - contentTitle: string (required)
    - platform: enum (required) - 'facebook' | 'youtube' | 'tiktok' | 'instagram'
    - contentQuantity: string (required)
    - deliveryDays: number (required, min 1)
    - expectedReach: number (optional)
    - expectedViews: number (optional)
    - expectedLikes: number (optional)
    - expectedComments: number (optional)
  - offerExpiresAt: Date (optional)
- globalOfferMessage: string (optional) - Default message for all influencers

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role
Note: Campaign must be in 'active' status

Get all influencer assignments for a specific campaign.

Path Params:
- id: UUID (required) - Campaign ID

Response includes:
- Assignment ID
- Influencer details (id, name, profileImage)
- Offered amount & total
- Status
- Response timestamp

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

query.description: Optional: pending | accepted | rejected | cancelled | in_progress | completed | expired

request.description:
Get all assignments across all campaigns with filters.

Query Params (SearchAssignmentDto):
- status: enum (optional) - 'pending' | 'accepted' | 'rejected' | 'cancelled' | 'in_progress' | 'completed' | 'expired'
- campaignId: UUID (optional)
- influencerId: UUID (optional)
- page: number (optional, default: 1)
- limit: number (optional, default: 10)

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Update a pending assignment offer.

Path Params:
- assignmentId: UUID (required)

DTO: UpdateAssignmentDto
- offeredAmount: number (optional, min 0)
- offerMessage: string (optional)
- offerTerms: string (optional)
- assignedMilestones: array (optional)
- offerExpiresAt: Date (optional)

Note: Can only update assignments with 'pending' status

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

Cancel an assignment (withdraw offer).

Path Params:
- assignmentId: UUID (required)

Note: Can only cancel assignments with 'pending' or 'accepted' status

Requires: JWT Token + Admin Role

query.description: Optional: pending | accepted | rejected | in_progress | completed | expired

request.description:
Get all campaign assignments/offers for the logged-in influencer.

Query Params (SearchAssignmentDto):
- status: enum (optional) - 'pending' | 'accepted' | 'rejected' | 'in_progress' | 'completed' | 'expired'
- page: number (optional, default: 1)
- limit: number (optional, default: 10)

Response includes:
- Assignment ID
- Campaign details (id, name)
- Offered amount
- Status
- Expiry date

Requires: JWT Token + Influencer Role

Get detailed information about a specific assignment offer.

Path Params:
- assignmentId: UUID (required)

Response includes:
- Campaign details (name, goals, product info, dates)
- Offer details (amount, message, terms)
- Assigned milestones
- Status & expiry

Requires: JWT Token + Influencer Role

Accept or reject a campaign assignment offer.

Path Params:
- assignmentId: UUID (required)

DTO: RespondAssignmentDto
- response: enum (required) - 'accepted' | 'rejected'
- responseMessage: string (optional)
- rejectionReason: string (optional, recommended if rejecting)

Effects:
- If accepted: Status changes to 'in_progress', work can begin
- If rejected: Status changes to 'rejected'

Note: Can only respond to 'pending' assignments that haven't expired

Requires: JWT Token + Influencer Role

Login for Lead Manager.

DTO: LoginDto

Create a new B2B lead.

DTO: CreateB2BDto
Bulk create B2B leads.
Get all B2B leads with pagination.

Search B2B leads.

DTO: SearchB2BDto
Export B2B leads to Excel.
Get a single B2B lead by ID.

Update a B2B lead.

DTO: UpdateB2BDto
Delete a B2B lead.

Create a new B2C lead.

DTO: CreateB2CDto
Bulk create B2C leads.
Get all B2C leads with pagination.

Search B2C leads.

DTO: SearchB2CDto
Export B2C leads to Excel.
Get a single B2C lead by ID.

Update a B2C lead.

DTO: UpdateB2CDto
Delete a B2C lead.

Get a pre-signed URL for uploading files to S3.

DTO: GetUploadUrlDto
